titleStmt.title: Iohn Spenser a Chesshire gallant his life and repentance, who for killing fo one Randall ... was lately executed at Burford a mile from Nantwich. To the tune of ...

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names and date of publication from STC.
Verse - "Kind hearted men, a ... give eare".
In two parts, printed side by side; the second part has title: Iohn Spenser his repentance in prison. Written with his owne hads as he lay in Chester Castle.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
